A question regarding combining.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : A question regarding combining.
By Miles Castea on Tuesday, January 22, 2008 - 02:05 pm:

Is it possible I can get pure breeds of a breed I have to unlock by combining? Like, if possible:

PengiMochi (Mocchi/Tiger)+Munitan (Gitan/Mocchi)=Mocchi (Mocchi/Mocchi).

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, January 23, 2008 - 08:35 am:

Not until you have gone through the storyline to unlock the breed.

By Love Me Do on Thursday, January 24, 2008 - 04:05 pm:

So it would work if it was just a standard breed, like Garu? If so, awesome! Thanks, Miles, never thought to try that.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, January 25, 2008 - 08:41 am:

No, you cannot get a breed you have to unlock in a storyline event by combining.

Non-locked breeds can be combined to fill your book, that's pretty standard practice.

By Salokin on Thursday, March 27, 2008 - 06:07 am:

I thought they had to have the same main breed like PengiMochi and another Mocchi main class like a Mocchi/Pixie with the PengiMochi to make a full breed mocchi.

By GM on Friday, March 28, 2008 - 01:25 pm:

MR4 features a combination loophole that allows two monsters with the same sub to result in a pure monster of that sub.

By Salokin on Sunday, March 30, 2008 - 07:48 am:

Okay. I didn't know that. Thx
